allocate_page

public void allocate_page(global.PageId start_page_num)
                   throws diskmgr.exception.OutOfSpaceException,
                          diskmgr.exception.InvalidRunSizeException,
                          diskmgr.exception.InvalidPageNumberException,
                          diskmgr.exception.FileIOException,
                          diskmgr.exception.DiskMgrException,
                          java.io.IOException
Allocate a set of pages where the run size is taken to be 1 by default. Gives back the page number of the first page of the allocated run. with default run_size =1

Parameters:
start_page_num - page number to start with
Throws:
diskmgr.exception.OutOfSpaceException - database is full
diskmgr.exception.InvalidRunSizeException - invalid run size
diskmgr.exception.InvalidPageNumberException - invalid page number
diskmgr.exception.FileIOException - DB file I/O errors
java.io.IOException - I/O errors

public void dump_space_map()
                    throws diskmgr.exception.DiskMgrException,
                           java.io.IOException,
                           diskmgr.exception.FileIOException,
                           diskmgr.exception.InvalidPageNumberException
Print out the space map of the database. The space map is a bitmap showing which pages of the db are currently allocated.

diskmgr.exception.FileIOException - file I/O error
